description: n*(mu(n) + 1), where mu(n) is the Moebius function A008683.
links: Harry J. Smith, Table of n, a(n) for n=1,...,1000
prog: (PARI) for(n=1,20,print(n*moebius(n)+n))(PARI) { for (n=1, 1000, write("b061669.txt", n, " ", n*moebius(n) + n) ) } [From _Harry J. Smith_, Jul 26 2009]
author: Jason Earls (zevi_35711(AT)yahoo.com), Jun 16 2001
